subject: p19182863
Findings: Tiny left apical pneumothorax is stable or slightly improved. The rest of the exam is unchanged with mild pulmonary edema and left middle lung opacity related to recent BAL. Prior sternotomy was done for aortic, mitral and tricuspid valve repair. Moderate cardiomegaly is stable.
Impression: Left minimal apical pneumothorax is unchanged or slightly improved. The rest of the exam is stable.
